entry.title: WIND WARNING , Marble Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 4:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 44 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Rain along parts of the coast early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
